titles.title: To reduce the duty on ceramic statues, statuettes, and handmade flowers until January 1, 1995.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E636-637)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 1994, the duty on porcelain or china statues, statuettes, and handmade flowers valued over $2.50 each and produced by professional sculptors.
